name: chivalry poverty alleviation development association
briefDescription: The Association started focusing on empowerment of the rural folks.Skill development training such as tree plantation,vermi composed,floriculture,low cost latrine,dairy farming,poultry,weaving,horticulture,bee keeping,piggery farming,adult educationSpecific problem that the organization is trying to addressThe Association was founded with a vision to empower the poor rural villagers through social,educational and economic actions to enable them to lead a constructive and meaningful life. The main aims an objects of the association have been enumerated in the memorandum of association.The association initiate in assisting poverty alleviation of the poor villagers. By providing self supporting schemes such as poultry and cash crops.
